title: Install the App
subtitle: Add Law of One Study Companion to your home screen for quick access, offline-ready experience, and a native app feel.
tip: PWA apps use your browser engine — no app store required.

ios.name: iOS (Safari)
ios.step1: Tap the Share button (square with arrow) in Safari's toolbar.
ios.step2: Scroll down and tap "Add to Home Screen".
ios.step3: Tap "Add" in the top-right corner to confirm.

android.name: Android (Chrome)
android.step1: Tap the menu icon (⋮) in Chrome's toolbar.
android.step2: Tap "Install app" or "Add to Home Screen".

desktop.name: Desktop (Chrome / Edge)
desktop.step1: Look for the install icon (⊕) in the right side of the address bar.
desktop.step2: Click "Install" in the prompt that appears.
desktop.step3: The app will open in its own window — pin it to your taskbar or dock.
